title: Stratos 4 Advance Kanketsu-hen

alternative_titles.ja: ストラトス・フォー アドヴァンス 完結編

synopsis:
With Mikaze Honjou shot, the newly-awakened Miharu Oozora on the run, and the rest of the Shimoji team scattered, things are not looking good. To make matters worse, new swarms of comets show up, threatening to strike even the Shimoji base itself. Now is the time for the girls to show what they are truly made of as they fight for what they believe in.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
